text: E ua mɨgeir akar kam, e ian aghariba apɨrtɨ, ia en ziaba fɨ suam, e gumazir aghuiba, e kamaghɨn nɨghnɨzir puvatɨ. Ia fo, marazi pura gumazibar ziar ekiaba itiba bagha bar akonge, egha men navimɨn aven otivir araziba bagh nɨghnɨzir puvatɨ. Ezɨ e kamagh sua, ia gumazir kabar akaba ikarvaghamin fofozim ikɨ. Bizir kamɨn e ia bagha osiri, eghtɨ ia en arazir aghuiba bagh bar akongegham.
